for  him  and  an  action  that  would  (foreseeably)  end  his  life  would  not  
be wrong.
Contrast this with the standard emergency medical treatment of the sui-
cidal. Even though the suicidal have indicated that they want to die, med-
ical personnel will act to save their lives. This supports the view that it is not
the mere desireto enjoy an FLO which is crucial to our understanding of the
wrongness of killing. Havingan FLO is wha
